description: Finalized, validated schedule output from The Orchestrator after synthesizing Sentry and Scout inputs.

scheduled_activities.description: List of activities that passed validation against user constraints.

action.description: The type of action to be executed.

date.description: The date of the scheduled activity.

time.description: The time of the activity in HH:MM format, or 'IMMEDIATE' for urgent actions.

participants.description: List of user IDs involved in the activity.

activity.description: Clean, human-readable name of the activity in Title Case.

location.description: Optional: Specific location or venue for the activity.

selection_reason.description: Explanation of why this activity passed validation, referencing both Sentry needs and Scout opportunities.
examples: Matches Sentry need for Social Bridging; Safe for current mobility level; Addresses critical disconnect with Hans.
Aligns with Sentry recommendation for Stress Relief; Event is indoor (matches weather constraints); User is available now.

sentry_alignment.description: Optional: Detailed alignment with Sentry assessment.

addresses_risk.description: The primary risk from Sentry that this activity addresses.

matches_action_type.description: The recommended_action_type from Sentry that this aligns with.

scout_source.description: Optional: Reference to the Scout opportunity that generated this activity.

rejected_opportunities.description: Optional: List of Scout opportunities that were rejected with reasons.

rejection_reason.description: Why this opportunity was rejected (e.g., 'Exceeds user exertion capacity', 'Conflicts with high stress state').

system_notes.description: Optional: Additional context for logging or debugging.

opportunities_evaluated.description: Total number of Scout opportunities evaluated.

opportunities_approved.description: Number of opportunities that passed validation.

scheduled_activities.selection_reason: Matches Sentry need for Social Bridging (critical disconnect detected); Safe for current high-stress state (passive social connection); Transit friction prevents physical meetup.
Matches Sentry recommendation for Routine Intervention; Weather is favorable; User mobility is moderate (suitable for gentle walk); Provides nature exposure for stress relief.

rejected_opportunities.rejection_reason: Bouldering session rejected: User exertion_status is SEDENTARY and stress_level is ELEVATED; high-intensity activity inappropriate.
